analysis_report.summary: 高尽责性、高外向性、中等宜人性、中等开放性、低神经质
analysis_report.detail: 基于言论样本分析：高尽责性体现在对国际事务的系统性关注和官方立场表述（如乌克兰和平进程、人质问题）；高外向性表现为频繁外交互动和公开声明（如与各国领导人会晤）；中等宜人性显示在支持民主价值观的同时保持外交克制；中等开放性体现在对多元议题的关注但未突破既定政策框架；低神经质表现为危机应对中的稳定情绪表达（如对灾难事件的回应）。

analysis_report.summary: 意识形态固化、过度依赖制度框架、情感表达程式化
analysis_report.detail: 意识形态固化：言论中反复强调“民主”、“自由开放”等价值观，缺乏对非西方视角的包容性表述（如对伊朗、乌干达的批评）；过度依赖制度框架：问题解决多依赖外交渠道和国际规则，缺乏创新性方案建议；情感表达程式化：慰问和谴责使用标准化外交辞令，缺乏个性化情感流露。

analysis_report.summary: 制度主义、多边主义、价值观驱动、危机导向
analysis_report.detail: 制度主义：倾向于通过现有国际机构和外交程序处理问题（如通过峰会、双边会谈）；多边主义：强调联盟合作（如Quad四方安全对话、东盟）；价值观驱动：将民主、人权作为政策核心考量；危机导向：对突发事件（灾难、冲突、人权事件）反应迅速但模式化。

analysis_report.summary: 反应模式可预测、过度依赖公开声明、行动透明度高
analysis_report.detail: 反应模式可预测：对同类事件（如自然灾害、人权事件）使用相似表述框架；过度依赖公开声明：主要通过社交媒体和官方声明传达立场，缺乏隐蔽行动迹象；行动透明度高：行程、会晤信息提前公开，降低行动突然性。

analysis_report.summary: 价值观绝对化、联盟依赖、对华戒备
analysis_report.detail: 价值观绝对化：将民主制度与人权标准作为普世价值，难以接受相对主义观点；联盟依赖：政策成功与否高度依赖盟友配合（如对乌克兰支持需多国协调）；对华戒备：在中国相关事件中（吉林袭击）强调领事保护而非合作，体现战略竞争思维。

analysis_report.summary: 资源分散、议程过载、执行依赖官僚体系
analysis_report.detail: 资源分散：同时关注乌克兰、中东、印太、拉美等多区域议题；议程过载：需处理从地缘战略到具体人质案件的多层级事务；执行依赖官僚体系：政策实施需通过国务院、国安会等多部门协调，效率受制于官僚流程。

analysis_report.summary: 认知负荷高、情感隔离、身份认同冲突
analysis_report.detail: 认知负荷高：需在复杂国际环境中平衡多重利益；情感隔离：在涉及伤亡事件时保持专业距离，可能影响共情决策；身份认同冲突：作为政策执行者需在理想价值观与现实政治间取得平衡。

analysis_report.summary: 巩固美国领导地位、遏制战略竞争对手、推广民主制度
analysis_report.detail: 巩固美国领导地位：通过多边机制（Quad、双边联盟）维持美国在关键区域影响力；遏制战略竞争对手：在印太推进“自由开放”以制衡中国，在东欧支持乌克兰以削弱俄罗斯；推广民主制度：通过对白俄罗斯、伊朗、乌干达等国的批评推进民主价值观。

analysis_report.summary: 地缘政治、人权民主、危机管理、联盟外交
analysis_report.detail: 地缘政治：乌克兰战争、中东冲突、印太战略；人权民主：白俄罗斯、伊朗、乌干达等人权议题；危机管理：自然灾害（巴西、肯尼亚）、事故（马拉维空难）、袭击事件（吉林）；联盟外交：与新加坡、巴拉圭、伊拉克等国的伙伴关系强化。

all_tweets.text: Congratulations to @LawrenceWongst on becoming Singapore’s fourth prime minister.  Our strategic partnership with Singapore is as strong as ever.  We look forward to continued innovation and cooperation to promote a free and open Indo-Pacific.
all_tweets.translation: 祝贺@LawrenceWongst成为新加坡第四任总理。我们与新加坡的战略伙伴关系一如既往地牢固。我们期待继续创新与合作，以促进自由开放的印太地区。

all_tweets.text: We extend our deepest condolences to the families, loved ones, and communities of those who have been impacted by the catastrophic flooding in Kenya over the past month. We offer our continued and resolute support to @WilliamsRuto and all Kenyans during the difficult days ahead.
all_tweets.translation: 我们对过去一个月肯尼亚灾难性洪水中受影响者的家人、亲人和社区表示最深切的哀悼。在未来的困难日子里，我们将继续坚定地支持@WilliamsRuto和所有肯尼亚人。

all_tweets.text: I traveled to Kyiv today to meet with @ZelenskyyUa & @AndriyYermak to reaffirm the United States’ unwavering commitment to supporting Ukraine. We have stood by Ukraine’s side since this war began and will do so every step of the way until Ukraine has prevailed.
all_tweets.translation: 我今天前往基辅会见@ZelenskyyUa和@AndriyYermak，重申美国支持乌克兰的坚定承诺。自这场战争开始以来，我们一直站在乌克兰一边，并将一路支持直到乌克兰取得胜利。

all_tweets.text: I met with @Tsihanouskaya of Belarus to convey our steadfast support for the people of Belarus in their pursuit of a democratic future. We will continue to hold the Lukashenka regime to account and demand the release of political prisoners.
all_tweets.translation: 我会见了白俄罗斯的@Tsihanouskaya，表达我们对白俄罗斯人民追求民主未来的坚定支持。我们将继续追究卢卡申科政权的责任，并要求释放政治犯。

all_tweets.text: Today we raised the Hostage and Wrongful Detainee Flag at the White House in memory of Majd Kamalmaz. We extend our deepest condolences to his family and we thank them for their continued advocacy in support of securing the release of all Americans held around the world.
all_tweets.translation: 今天我们在白宫升起人质和不当拘留者旗帜，以纪念Majd Kamalmaz。我们向他的家人表示最深切的哀悼，并感谢他们持续倡导支持确保释放世界各地被关押的所有美国人。

all_tweets.text: We are deeply concerned by the stabbing of U.S. citizens in Jilin City, China. Our team has been in touch with these Americans and our PRC counterparts to ensure that the victims’ needs are met, & appropriate law enforcement steps are being taken. We wish them a speedy recovery.
all_tweets.translation: 我们对中国吉林市美国公民被刺事件深表关切。我们的团队已与这些美国人及中方对应部门联系，以确保满足受害者的需求，并采取适当的执法措施。我们祝愿他们早日康复。

all_tweets.text: Saddened to learn an aircraft carrying Malawian VP Chilima and nine others has crashed. The United States offers our deepest condolences, stands by Malawi during this difficult time, and will continue to offer our resolute support in search and recovery operations.
all_tweets.translation: 得知载有马拉维副总统奇利马及其他九人的飞机坠毁，我们深感悲痛。美国表示最深切的哀悼，在此困难时刻与马拉维站在一起，并将继续在搜救行动中提供坚定的支持。

all_tweets.text: Today I met with the families of Americans being held hostage by Hamas. I wanted to update them directly on the proposal that’s on the table right now that will bring their loved ones home and lead to a more secure Israel. As the President said last week, this deal must get done. https://t.co/fAIxOq1fFJ
all_tweets.translation: 今天我会见了被哈马斯扣押的美国人质家属。我想直接向他们通报目前摆在桌面上的提案，该提案将让他们的亲人回家，并带来一个更安全的以色列。正如总统上周所说，必须达成这项协议。https://t.co/fAIxOq1fFJ

all_tweets.text:
Pleased to meet Paraguayan President @SantiPenap to advance shared economic, security, and democratic priorities. On behalf of @POTUS, I welcomed Paraguay’s support for democracy in Venezuela and condemnation of Russia’s war against Ukraine.
https://t.co/vckpnoRjmr https://t.co/lZOZset87U
all_tweets.translation: 很高兴会见巴拉圭总统@SantiPenap，以推进共同的经济、安全和民主优先事项。我代表@POTUS，欢迎巴拉圭支持委内瑞拉的民主并谴责俄罗斯对乌克兰的战争。https://t.co/vckpnoRjmr https://t.co/lZOZset87U

all_tweets.text: Congratulations to President-elect @Prabowo on his victory in Indonesia’s presidential election.  As the world’s second- and third-largest democracies, we look forward to continued cooperation in support of ASEAN and a free and open Indo-Pacific.
all_tweets.translation: 祝贺总统当选人@Prabowo在印度尼西亚总统选举中获胜。作为世界第二和第三大民主国家，我们期待继续合作，支持东盟和一个自由开放的印太地区。

all_tweets.text: The Uganda Court’s decision to uphold most aspects of the Anti-Homosexuality Act is deeply disappointing, imperils human rights, & jeopardizes economic prosperity for all Ugandans.
all_tweets.translation: 乌干达法院决定维持《反同性恋法》的大部分内容，这令人深感失望，危及人权，并损害所有乌干达人的经济繁荣。

all_tweets.text: The Georgian people are making their views known. Undeterred by intimidation tactics, tens of thousands of peaceful protestors turned out in rainy Tbilisi today to demand Georgian Dream withdraw the legislation.
all_tweets.translation: 格鲁吉亚人民正在表达他们的观点。尽管受到恐吓策略的阻挠，今天仍有数万名和平抗议者在雨中的第比利斯集会，要求格鲁吉亚梦想党撤回该立法。

all_tweets.text: We strongly condemn the death sentence for Iranian rapper Toomaj Salehi.  His voice amplifies the aspirations of the Iranian people and all those silenced by the regime.  We call for his immediate release.  #SaveToomaj.
all_tweets.translation: 我们强烈谴责对伊朗说唱歌手Toomaj Salehi判处死刑。他的声音放大了伊朗人民以及所有被该政权压制者的愿望。我们呼吁立即释放他。#SaveToomaj。

all_tweets.text: This morning, I spoke with my Israeli counterpart, National Security Advisor Hanegbi, to discuss events in the Middle East. During the call, I reiterated the United States’ ironclad commitment to the security of Israel.
all_tweets.translation: 今天早上，我与以色列同行、国家安全顾问哈内格比通话，讨论了中东局势。通话中，我重申了美国对以色列安全的坚定承诺。

all_tweets.text: One year ago, Quad Leaders met in Hiroshima and announced tangible benefits for our partners in the Indo-Pacific. Much progress has been made in the year since. We look forward to the next Summit later this year to continue advancing our shared vision for a free and open region. https://t.co/V0dGvcJzpO
all_tweets.translation: 一年前，四方安全对话领导人在广岛会晤，并宣布为我们在印太地区的伙伴带来切实利益。自那一年以来已取得很大进展。我们期待今年晚些时候的下一次峰会，以继续推进我们对自由开放地区的共同愿景。https://t.co/V0dGvcJzpO

all_tweets.text: This weekend’s summit was a critical milestone on a path toward a just peace in Ukraine. The U.S. will proudly walk with Ukraine along that path until Ukraine prevails and peace prevails. https://t.co/wiAZjyGIKE
all_tweets.translation: 本周末的峰会是通往乌克兰公正和平道路上的一个关键里程碑。美国将自豪地与乌克兰同行，直到乌克兰获胜、和平降临。https://t.co/wiAZjyGIKE

all_tweets.text: We extend our deepest condolences to the families, loved ones, and communities of those who have been impacted by flooding and landslides in southern Brazil. We will continue supporting @LulaOficial's robust response to assist all Brazilians in these difficult times.
all_tweets.translation: 我们对巴西南部洪水和山体滑坡中受影响者的家人、亲人和社区表示最深切的哀悼。我们将继续支持@LulaOficial强有力的应对措施，以在这些困难时期援助所有巴西人。

all_tweets.text: Honored to have Iraqi Deputy Prime Minister Dr. Fuad Hussein back at the White House today to discuss further strengthening our partnership and to lay the groundwork for the important visit of Iraqi Prime Minister Mohammed Shia’a Al-Sudani next month.
all_tweets.translation: 今天很荣幸再次在白宫接待伊拉克副总理福阿德·侯赛因博士，讨论进一步加强我们的伙伴关系，并为下个月伊拉克总理穆罕默德·希亚·苏达尼的重要访问奠定基础。

all_tweets.text: Was great talking with @AmbMonicaJuma today. We greatly appreciate Kenya’s commitment to bring relief to the people of Haiti and efforts to address current challenges in the Horn of Africa.
all_tweets.translation: 今天与@AmbMonicaJuma的交谈非常愉快。我们非常赞赏肯尼亚承诺为海地人民提供救济，并努力应对非洲之角当前的挑战。

all_tweets.text: I extend our deepest condolences to Pres. @WilliamsRuto, @kdfinfo, and all Kenyans on the loss of Chief of Defense Forces General Ogolla and other victims in a helicopter crash today. Gen. Ogolla was a key partner in our strategic relationship and we will miss working with him.
all_tweets.translation: 我向@WilliamsRuto总统、@kdfinfo和所有肯尼亚人就今天直升机坠毁事件中失去国防军总参谋长奥戈拉将军及其他遇难者表示最深切的哀悼。奥戈拉将军是我们战略关系中的关键伙伴，我们将怀念与他共事的日子。
